body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Perry County, Kentucky, native. Married to Minerva Haddix Little. Father of Samantha Little, George Little, Catherine Little, James Little, Nancy Little, Harrison Little, Evoline Little, Armina Little, Joanna Little, and Eliza Little. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1863.
